marvel.description: Shatterstar is Gaveedra Seven, the product of bio-engineering on an otherdimensional world, who was at one point merged with an Earth mutant named Benjamin Russell, the nature of whose genetic mutation remains unknown.

name: Shatterstar
powersText: Superhuman physical attributes and accelerated healing factor
Ability to generate vibratory shockwaves and create teleportation portals through his swords
